page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content: Many dwellings cater for the tourist in a simple way, such as Bed,Breakfast and Evening Meal.There is one site for tents and caravans at Thorne and high qualitiy self catering accommodation at The Old Rectory.There is little to interest the visitor who has no love for the countryside or for walking, apart from the visitors' viewing platform at the forge of The Cornish Ironcraft Company_also a crafts centre. The nearest shops are in Kilkhampton, where there is also a fine 17th century church. Many tourists pass through, on the main Bude to Bideford road. The nearby reservoir at Tamar Lakes is host to many interesting birds.You may sail and fish there, but not swim.the nearest beaches are at Duckpool, where there is a nature trail and Sandymouth, where there are lifeguards
